Package com.uber.m3.tally

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BaseStatsReporter
    Base interface for all reporters.
    BucketPair
    A BucketPair describes the lower and upper bounds for a derived bucket from a buckets set.
    Buckets<E>
    Buckets of a Histogram.
    Capabilities
    Represents the capabilities of an object.
    Counter
    A counter metric.
    CounterSnapshot
    A snapshot of a Counter.
    Gauge
    A gauge metric.
    GaugeSnapshot
    A snapshot of a Gauge.
    Histogram
    A histogram metric.
    HistogramSnapshot
    A snapshot of a Histogram.
    Scope
    A namespace wrapper around a stats reporter, ensuring that all emitted values have a given prefix or set of tags.
    Snapshot
    A snapshot of values since last report execution.
    StatsReporter
    A backend for Scopes to report metrics to.
    StopwatchRecorder
    A recorder that is called when a Stopwatch is stopped with stop().
    Timer
    A timer metric.
    TimerSnapshot
    A snapshot of a Timer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBuckets<T>
    Abstract Buckets implementation for common functionality.
    BucketPairImpl
    Default implementation of a BucketPair
    CapableOf
    Default implementation of Capabilities.
    DurationBuckets
    Buckets implementation backed by Durations.
    RootScopeBuilder
    Builder class for constructing root Scopes.
    ScopeBuilder
    Builder class to create Scopes.
    Stopwatch
    A stopwatch that is used to record for Timers and Histograms.
    ValueBuckets
    Buckets implementation backed by Double values.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ScopeCloseException
